login_bottom_text: Negociar FX & CFD envolve risco substancial e pode levar à perda de todo o capital investido

assesment_text_top: Para satisfazer os requisitos legais e regulamentares existentes, precisamos de saber um pouco sobre a sua experiência relevante e o seu conhecimento de produtos de investimento.
banktransfer_instructions: Por favor, consulte abaixo as instruções detalhadas de transferência. Para sua comodidade, pode imprimi-las e apresentá-las ao seu banco, para que iniciem a transferência.

iUnderstandPart1: Eu compreendo que estarei a negociar apenas
totalVolume: Por favor, indique o volume total de transações nos produtos acima anteriormente realizados por mês (em média):
professionalExperience: Tem a experiência ou as qualificações que o ajudam a entender o risco do CFD?

samePassword: Não utilize a mesma palavra-passe que utilizou connosco anteriormente
usePersonalDetails: Não utilize palavras de dicionário, o seu nome, o endereço de email, o número de telefone móvel ou outras informações pessoais que possam ser facilmente obtidas

verificationCamera: Para continuar, basta carregar ou usar a câmara do telefone para tirar fotos dos documentos necessários
verificationProtected: Os seus dados estão protegidos e seguros connosco. Eles são mantidos em sigilo com o único objetivo de confirmar a sua identidade

frozenAccountText: A sua conta foi congelada devido a atividades recentes que ativaram algum alerta de segurança. O seu gestor de conta entrará em contacto consigo em breve para reativar a sua conta. Pedimos desculpas pelo incómodo

backupGAC: Be sure to backup this code! If you lose it, the process to unlock your account requires considerable time and verification.
enterYourOTP: To verify, please enter your one-time password
otp_description:
Enable stronger security for your trading account with both your password and your phone/browser.

Two-Factor authentication allows you to require a code from a device you own before you can login, this makes it much more difficult for someone to gain unauthorized access to your account. We currently support browser addon and app based 2FA.

quizQuestions.1: What do you use the platform for?
quizQuestions.2: What is your source of funds?

withdrawComplianceText: In order to process your withdrawal request, you are required to fill the following compliance form and to upload your proof of identity and proof of residence documents
toThisDepositAddress: to this deposit address. Sending any other coin or token to this address may result in the loss of your deposit
tin_more_long: SSN/TIN cannot be more than 50 characters long.
information_financial: This information is required by financial regulations and helps us to protect you and your money.
us_reportable: É um cidadão declarante dos EUA
usCitizenPopupBody: Please note that due to regulation reasons we do not process customers reporting to the US.

questionnarie_questions.5: Are you a politically exposed person?
questionnarie_questions.7: What's your approximate Net Wealth (financial instruments + cash)?
questionnarie_questions.8: How much do you expect to deposit in the next year with us?
questionnarie_questions.9: What will be the main source of your trading funds?
questionnarie_questions.10: Why do you want to trade?
questionnarie_questions.11: How do you think you will react if you incur trading losses?
questionnarie_questions.12: Which of the following instruments have you traded before?
questionnarie_questions.13: Average frequency of your annual past transactions:
questionnarie_questions.14: Average trade size (volume) of your annual past transactions:
questionnarie_questions.17: Which of the following is correct regarding Contracts for Difference (CFDs)?
questionnarie_questions.18: What is the main factor that can affect the prices of the underlying currency exchange (forex) markets?
questionnarie_questions.19: If you open a position on the BMW share through our platform, where can you close it?
questionnarie_questions.20: What would be the required margin to open a CFD of 1 Lot (€100,000) on EUR/USD, assuming your leverage is 1:100 (i.e. margin 1%)?
questionnarie_questions.21: A Trader has a trading capital/equity of €10,000 and opens a CFD position on EUR/USD at 1.1000. What will be the loss when the price moves against the Trader by 10 pips if the pip value is €45 and the leverage is 1:50.

questionnarie_answers.8: Funds, Venture capital, Private Equity Investments
questionnarie_answers.16: Accounting, Banking, Business, Economics, Finance, Financial Services or similar
questionnarie_answers.18: Computer science, IT, Engineering, Architecture or similar
questionnarie_answers.49: Take a chance to earn additional income
questionnarie_answers.51: Repay current debt (e.g. mortgage) / health expense / tuition
questionnarie_answers.52: It’s no big deal. I’m willing to risk my capital for potential profits.
questionnarie_answers.53: I expect to lose sometimes. It’s part of trading. If I make a loss, I’ll review and revise my trading strategy.
questionnarie_answers.54: I might take a break for a while, but then I may continue.
questionnarie_answers.55: I won’t be able to sleep at night.
questionnarie_answers.56: Forex/CFDs/Spread Betting and other leveraged products
questionnarie_answers.57: Shares, Bonds, Binary Options or other non-leveraged products
questionnarie_answers.63: More than $10,000 in Stocks/Cryptos and/or $30,000 in Forex/Commodities
questionnarie_answers.64: More than $4,000 in Stocks/Cryptos and/or $18,500 in Forex/Commodities
questionnarie_answers.65: Less than $4,000 in Stocks/Cryptos and/or $18,500 in Forex/Commodities
questionnarie_answers.68: I am working or I have worked in the financial sector for at least 1 year in a professional position, which requires knowledge of the CFDs and/or other derivative complex products.
questionnarie_answers.69: I attended seminars and tutorials relating to trading CFDs.
questionnarie_answers.72: Are physically delivering the underlying asset to the trader

loan_popup: It is not advisable to deposit funds that you are not able and prepared to lose. If you do not have any other source of funds we will not be able to open you a trading account.
repay_popup: Due to the complex nature of CFDs, we advise you not to trade with the objective of making money to repay important expenses as the risk of loss might be higher. If this is your objective we will not be able to open you a trading account.
sleep_popup: CFDs are highly complex and risky and are not appropriate for all traders especially persons who are risk averse or conservative. If this is your attitude to risk we will not be able to open you a trading account.
negative_scoring: Dear customer, Based on the information you have submitted, please note that you do not appear to posses the appropriate knowledge and experience to deal in the financial instruments and services our company offers, since these are considered as complex products. We are concerned you do not understand the risks involved. Therefore, we do not recommend you proceed with the opening of a live trading account and opened a demo account for you to review and gain some experience in our platform.
retail_customers: Dear customer, Based on the information you have submitted, we have opened a live trading account for you. Please note that in order to start with the trading activity, you will have to upload your documents located in the verification center.
emptyPspMessage: To perform a deposit, please contact your [Brand Name] Account Manager directly or [Brand Name] Support Team at support@[Brand Name].com.
tnc1: In order to proceed with your live account, please accept the
tnc2: , and confirm that you are over 18 year of age.
depositUnavailableContent: Your account manager will contact you shortly
qrcodeInfo: Por favor, faça o upload do comprovante de pagamento na seção de documentos após a transação ser finalizada.
trading_central_not_validated: Your account must have minimum of %minTotalDeposit% to access Trading Tools

Please insert your email and click the button.
